DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research investigate use Candela V-beam Pulsed Dye Laser treatment onychomycosis , nail fungus . Hypothesis : Complete nail clearance occur approximately half patient 3 laser treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: 10 patient participate nationally . The investigator hope enroll 10 patient Jefferson . Involvement study last 8-12 week subject . The entire study take 12 month complete .
DOC.criteria: Ages 1865 year old Diagnosis onychomycosis base positive fungal culture dermatophyte positive PAS toenail clip HIV/immunosuppression Candidal toenail infection Prior PO antifungal therapy within last 6 month Personal history psoriasis , lichen planus , significant photosensitivity disorder Any serious generalize medical condition
